I don't think my ads are hyperbolic. They do not mention price.

Hi Raymond, I understand your concern about your ads not being hyperbolic. Ad rejection reasons can vary, and it's important to ensure that all aspects of the ad comply with our guidelines. I recommend reviewing the specific feedback provided by Ad Support in your email for more details on why your ad was rejected. Additionally, you can check out our advertising policy for more information on what is allowed: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
